title: Minecraft被抄袭了 你知道么?
txt_content:
近期中国大陆淘米公司的《魔法哈奇·创意空间》严重侵权了Minecraft游戏，并疑似抄袭夏日summer材质包，但从无改正现象，反而离mc特征越来越近，甚至饥饿条、生命条、各种界面、物品都一模一样，以此来招引不知道Minecraft存在的玩家。这样一来肯定不是巧合了。虽然放在百度百科内不是很好，但是希望能招起某些能联系到mc官网的朋友代表我们传达信息，侵权是对Minecraft作者的不尊重！官方已经顶着赚不到钱的风险让中国玩盗版，难道你还能看着中国借此为理由随便抄袭官方吗？你会抛弃Minecraft么?
Recently, the company China rice "magic Hatchie creative space" serious violations of the Minecraft game, and suspected plagiarism summer summer material package, but never correct phenomenon, but from the MC feature more and more close, and even starvation, the life bar, a variety of interface, objects are exactly the same, in order to attract do not know the existence of Minecraftgame player. It is certainly not a coincidence. While the Baidu Wikipedia is not very good, but hope to make some link to the MC website friends we convey information, tort is not respect to the author of Minecraft! Officials have braved the risk of not making money, let Chinese play pirated, you can look at Chineseto simply copy the official reason? You will leave Minecraft?
